title: Asi, Imwe Temberi?
paragraphs:
Pakutanga kwaiva nebako.
"Ngakuve nechiedza," akadaro tochi.
Uye mukati mebako iroro, vanhu vakagadzira mifananidzo.
Vakapenda mhuka dzavaizovhima;
vakapenda ramangwana ravo ravaida,
kwete kushongedza asi kukumbira.
Vakatamba,
uye bako rikava temberi.

Vanhu vanovaka temberi.
Vanhu vanobva kunyika dzakasiyana-siyana, vasina kumbosangana, vanovaka temberi.
Paunotarisa mutemberi, unoona girazi;
mufananidzo wezvataiva uye kuti taida kuva vanaani.

Rationality yakavaka Parthenon muAthens.
Kubatana kwakavaka Kaaba muMecca.
Kuchena kwakavaka Kashi Vishwanath Tembere paGanges.
Endurance inochengetedza Western Wall muJerusarema.
Kujekeswa kwakavaka Shwedagon Pagoda muYangon.
Uye kuenderera kwemadzitateguru kunovaka Candombl√© terreiros muSalvador.

Chinhu chose chiri mutemberi chikumbiro.
Inogona kureba secathedral inoita kuti unzwe mudiki,
kwasviba segomba remuti rinokuita kuti utarise mukati.
wakashama serenje rinonyaradza kudzongonyedzwa.
kana anozvikudza nendarama inopikira kukunda;

Temberi zviratidzo zvehunhu hwedu hwemweya,
inotungamirira kunzvimbo tsvene mukati,
kwatingavhura simba rekusika
zvemukati mekusaziva kwedu kwakadzama.

Nyanzvi, semupristi, muchenjeri, kana shaman, inotora chikamu muchivakwa ichi chakaungana.
Sezvavakamboita mubako,
basa ravo nderekupa muviri kune zvakakosha,
kuti vape maoko avo kune vanoda kuberekwa, kuti vashumire zvinofanira kuvapo.
Ivo varanda, vanovaka, muchidimbu;
izvo vanhu vanofanira kuratidzwa panyama.

Asi hazvisi zvikamu zvese zvetemberi zvakasikwa zvakaenzana.
Iyo inonyanya kukosha chikamu chetemberi chero ipi zvayo
richagara riri mukova wayo.

Mikova yetemberi inobata simba rayo rokucheka, kukwevera ronda pakati peanogona kupinda neasingagoni.
Ndiko kuti temberi inova bakatwa.

Uye bakatwa iri rakashandiswa kwemazana emakore,
zvinopesana neruvara rweganda,
nzvimbo yekuzvarwa,
vanhu vanoda,
zvipfeko zvavanopfeka,
uye zvavanosarudza kuita nemiviri yavo.

Kunyange temberi dzinoti dzinogamuchira vose
kumira pakati pendudzi dzisingadaro.

Temberi yeBuddha yakazaruka muNepal
haikwanise kushanyirwa nemunhu wese anoda kupinda.
Miganhu, mavhiza, uye zvematongerwo enyika zvinosarudza kuti ndiani anganamata.
Chechi muChina, mosque iri muJerusarema,
temberi muTibet,
ose anomira seri kwemadziro asingaoneki.
Uye mukati mamasvingo iwayo munondo uchiri unopinza.

Hapana temberi inogona kubatanidzwa zvakanyanya.
Hapana nzvimbo Panyika
iyo inogona kuchengeta pasi rose dzvene.

Kunyange zvakadaro vanhu vose vakararama vakavaka temberi.
uchapupu hwokuti chimwe chinhu chitsvene chinotibatanidza.
Chinhu chisingaone miganhu.
Chimwe chinhu chakakodzera nzvimbo yacho pachayo.

Taizovaka kupi temberi yakadaro?
Kusina madziro angasvika.
hapana nyika inogona kutaura,
hapana chitendero chinogona kutonga.
Nzvimbo.

Hongu, nzvimbo ino inzvimbo.
Kunyange kana vashoma vane ropafadzo ikozvino vakaedza kuzvitora,
uye kunyange sezvo nzvimbo inotsungirira dambudziko rayo retsika,
simba rayo mukufungidzira kwedu nderekare.
Iyo isingagumi kumusoro, iyo nzvimbo, nzvimbo yekudenga, matenga;
yekare yakajairika yatinogovana.
Space inotakura murairo wemadzitateguru
kuti tibatane.
Panogona kunge paine nzvimbo inodarika miganhu yese, yekuti vanhu vese nezvisikwa zvese zvinonzwa, tembere yekuzvifungidzira isu seboka rimwe, tichitungamirwa nehunhu hwatiri kugadzira.
Uku ndiko kukoka kurudzi rutsva rwetsika.
Kukoka kwehunyanzvi kugadzira temberi munzvimbo, temberi yakavakwa pasina madziro anogona kusvika.

Funga nezvehupenyu hunofanira kuyeukwa.
Nyora zita pano.

Uye isu tichaibata.
Kana Temberi yeOrbital inobatana nema antennas edu Panyika,
zita richamuka.
Iyo satellite ichaichengeta mundangariro dzayo
uye kutumira meseji kwauri:
Nhasi, panguva ino, zita ramakatuma rakwira, uye richiripo.

The Orbital Tembere ibasa remifananidzo,
uye satellite.
Uye kunyangwe ine "temberi" muzita rayo,
inova temberi chete kana
unosarudza kuiona seimwe.

Yavepo zvino sechipopotera,
yakafanana neyakagadzirwa nevanyori
mubako rekutanga iroro.

Uye isu tichiri mubako,
rima guru remuchadenga,
uko Nyika iri mwenje,
nzvimbo chete yatinoziva
consciousness iripo for sure.

Nyanzvi ichiri kushanda,
vanhu vachiri kutamba,
tichishumira sezvakaitwa nemadzitateguru edu.
kupenda, kuveza, kugadzira ramangwana redu ratinoda,
kwete kushongedza asi kukumbira,
saka temberi itsva inogona kuberekwa.

Uye hongu,
unokokwa kutamba.
